name: Jewels of Darkness
description:
This is a collection of three previously-published Rainbird interactive fiction (with graphics) games. It contains:
  • Adventure Quest
  • Colossal Adventure
  • Dungeon Adventure
The J.R.R. Tolkien Middle-earth theme was removed in this compilation. Only the respective original releases of the games have references to Middle-earth.
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Amstrad PCW, Apple II, Atari 8-bit, Atari ST, Commodore 64, DOS, Macintosh, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
